Connection to the LINCS Community

Congratulations on completing Teaching Energy Literacy to Adult Learners! To continue your learning beyond the course and connect with other practitioners, we encourage you to join a LINCS Community group! The Science Group and the Career Pathways and Postsecondary Transitions Group are two that might be of particular interest based on your learning in this course. No matter which group(s) you choose, you will find discussions, resources, and live events to further develop your teaching practices and share your expertise.

Continue Your Learning

You might also consider taking other self-directed courses on LINCS Courses. Courses under the Science heading focus on teaching science in adult basic education/adult secondary education (ABE/ASE) and English Language Acquisition (ELA) classes.

Resources for Learners

The LINCS Learner Center is a student-oriented site where adult learners can find resources for their own self-directed exploration and further learning. Check out the Learn Science page, among other goal-focused categories, and help learners make their own connections.
